property.name: obkv.table.client.mode
property.description: Client mode, `direct` or `proxy`. `direct` means that client access observer by config url directly. `proxy` means that client access observer by OceanBase database proxy.

property.name: obkv.table.client.config.url
property.description: Client config url. ConfigUrl is used to obtain RsList by using the http service. Note that `and` sign should be written as `&`.

property.name: obkv.table.client.full.username
property.description: Full user name for accessing database. Format id "userName@tenantName#clusterName".

property.name: obkv.table.client.password
property.description: Password corresponding to user. Password is the password of the fullUserName user.

property.name: obkv.table.client.sys.username
property.description: System tenant username for accessing database. SysUserName and sysPassWord is used to access the routing table. Therefore, it must be a system tenant.

property.name: obkv.table.client.sys.password
property.description: Password corresponding to system tenant user.

property.name: obkv.table.client.conn.pool.max.conn.size
property.description: Default size of ConnPoolMaxConnSize.

property.name: obkv.table.client.conn.connect.timeout
property.description: Default size of ConnConnectTimeOut in millisecond.

property.name: obkv.table.client.conn.login.timeout
property.description: Default size of ConnLoginTimeout in millisecond.

property.name: obkv.table.client.conn.operation.timeout
property.description: Default size of OperationTimeOut in millisecond.

property.name: obkv.table.client.log.level
property.description: Default LogLevel. info / debug / warn / error / dpanic / panic / fatal default is info level.

property.name: obkv.table.client.table.entry.refresh.lock.timeout
property.description: Default size of TableEntryRefreshLockTimeout in millisecond.

property.name: obkv.table.client.table.entry.refresh.try.times
property.description: Default size of TableEntryRefreshTryTimes.

property.name: obkv.table.client.table.entry.refresh.interval.base
property.description: Default size of TableEntryRefreshIntervalBase in millisecond.

property.name: obkv.table.client.table.entry.refresh.interval.ceiling
property.description: Default size of TableEntryRefreshIntervalCeiling in millisecond.

property.name: obkv.table.client.metadata.refresh.interval
property.description: Default size of MetadataRefreshInterval in millisecond.

property.name: obkv.table.client.metadata.refresh.lock.timeout
property.description: Default size of MetadataRefreshLockTimeout in millisecond.

property.name: obkv.table.client.rslist.local.file.location
property.description: Location of RsList local file.

property.name: obkv.table.client.rslist.http.get.timeout
property.description: Default size of RsListHttpGetTimeout in millisecond.

property.name: obkv.table.client.rslist.http.get.retry.times
property.description: Default size of RsListHttpGetRetryTimes.

property.name: obkv.table.client.rslist.http.get.retry.interval
property.description: Default size of RsListHttpGetRetryInterval in millisecond.

property.name: obkv.table.client.enable.rerouting
property.description: Whether enable rerouting in client
